languages.text: "Пускай Владайм и гнилоустый ашмаг, но он не дурак. Это насколько же смехотворными должны быть условия сделки, чтобы он предпочел отказать {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольному Торговцу{/g}. Катастрофически невыгодными, я полагаю.

traits.locale_text: "Пускай Владайм и гнилоустый ашмаг, но он не дурак. Это насколько же смехотворными должны быть условия сделки, чтобы он предпочел отказать Вольному Торговцу. Катастрофически невыгодными, я полагаю.

languages.text: "Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."
languages.original_text: "Пускай Владайм и гнилоустый ашмаг, но он не дурак. Это насколько же смехотворными должны быть условия сделки, чтобы он предпочел отказать {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольному Торговцу{/g}. Катастрофически невыгодными, я полагаю.

"Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

"Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

"Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

"Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

languages.text: 「ヴラダイムは口が悪いアッシュマグかもしれないけれど、馬鹿ではないわ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の申し出を断るとはよほどの条件だったのでしょうね。破滅的なほど不利な条件だったのじゃなくて」
languages.original_text: "Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイムは口が悪いアッシュマグかもしれないけれど、馬鹿ではないわ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の申し出を断るとはよほどの条件だったのでしょうね。破滅的なほど不利な条件だったのじゃなくて」

languages.text: “或许弗拉达姆是个满口污言秽语的坏种，但他可不是白痴。若是他拒绝了{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}开出的条件，那只能说明条件一定相当荒谬。可以说，恐怕是灾难性地对他不利。”
languages.original_text: "Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

traits.locale_text: “或许弗拉达姆是个满口污言秽语的坏家伙，但他可不是白痴。若是他拒绝了{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}开出的条件，那只能说明条件一定相当荒谬。可以说，恐怕是灾难性地对他不利。”

languages.text: «Vladaym será un ashmag y un bocazas, pero de tonto no tiene nada. Las condiciones del contrato tienen que ser ilusorias para que rechace la oferta de un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Es más, diría que deplorables».
languages.original_text: "Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

traits.locale_text: «Vladaym será un ashmag y un bocazas, pero de tonto no tiene nada. Las condiciones del contrato tienen que ser ilusorias para que rechace la oferta de un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Es más, diría que deplorables».

languages.text: « Vladaym est peut-être une pourriture d'ashmag, mais il est loin d'être stupide. S'il a refusé l'offre d'une {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}, c'est que ses termes devaient être grotesques, voire catastrophiquement défavorables. »
languages.original_text: "Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

traits.locale_text: « Vladaym est peut-être une pourriture d'ashmag, mais il est loin d'être stupide. S'il a refusé l'offre d'une {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}, c'est que ses termes devaient être grotesques, voire catastrophiquement défavorables. »

languages.text: "Vladaym mag ein faulmauliger Ashmag sein, aber er ist kein Narr. Die Vertragskonditionen müssen für ihn lächerlich gewesen sein, sonst hätte er das Angebot einer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} niemals abgelehnt. Katastrophal nachteilig, würde ich vermuten."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym mag ein faulmauliger Ashmag sein, aber er ist kein Narr. Die Vertragskonditionen müssen für ihn lächerlich gewesen sein, sonst hätte er das Angebot einer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} niemals abgelehnt. Katastrophal nachteilig, würde ich vermuten."

languages.text: "Vladaym, dili zehir saçan külboğazın teki olsa da zekâsı inkâr edilemez. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} teklifine burun kıvırdığına göre şartlar gülünç olmalı. Belli ki onun için getirisine kıyasla feci götürüsü var."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym may be a putrid-mouthed ashmag, but he's no fool. The terms of the deal must have been ludicrous for him to refuse a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s offer. Catastrophically unfavourable, I'd say."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym, her kelimesinden zehir akan külboğazın teki olabilir ancak zekâsını inkâr edilemez. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in teklifine burun kıvırdığına göre şartlar gülünç olmalı. Herhangi bir şekilde kârlı çıkamadığına bahse girerim."
